page.title: 04Sindles Farm(continued)
page.content:
On the farm their breed of cows are Friesians from Holland which are black and white and produce a lot of milk. They have one Friesian bull on the farm but it is only a calf also they have a Gurnsey calf which is only a pet but when it is older they are hoping to put it on show. An avarge cow would cost about Â£500 at market. A female dairy cow needs a calf each year before it can give milk. At birth the calf is taken away from its mother, hand fed brought up in a pen.
Written by Philippa Lay Helen Anthony
